result.Case Summary: FINANCIAL INDUSTRY REGULATORY AUTHORITY OFFICE OF HEARING OFFICERS DEPARTMENT OF ENFORCEMENT, Complainant, v. BRUCE KATZ (CRD No. 1234370), Respondent.
